name: Candlelit Moments candles, Delicious scents, 8ozs, Close out Sale
description:
Our candles are amazing. We have been in the candle business for over 10 years. They are made of a natural wax, are environmentally friendly and have excellent scent throw. You will not be disappointed.

Close out sale on the following scents:

Blackberry, Pearberry, Sweet Mango, Clean Cotton, Lemon Slices, Woodsy Lavender, Pink Sugar (smells like Cotton Candy), Storm, Citrus Cilantro, Raspberry, Romance (VS scent), White Ginger & Amber, Cappuccino Brule, Very Sexy (VS Scent) and Blackberry Vanilla.

Sale Prices:
16ozs- $18 (Reg. price $24.95)
8ozs- $9 (Reg. price $12.95)
Votives $1 each (Reg. price $1.50 each)

Please email me your requests to check scent availability.

***The 8oz jar is the one in the middle**** 

Be sure to check out our WONDERFUL cosmetic line at: www.glowcosmeticsinc.com   

We also have a jewelry line with BEAUTIFUL toe rings. Check them out at: www.dazzlemedesigns.net

name: Candlelit Moments, Cinnamon Buns, 8oz. candle- Top Seller!
description:
This is a 8oz. candle made with a natural, crystal wax which is environmentally friendly. Candlelit Moments candles are hand poured, smell wonderful and come in a glass container with a lid. I test each candle scent personally and make sure that each candle has an AMAZING scent throw. Our  8oz. candles have approximately a 25 hour burn time. I have been told (numerous times) that Candlelit Moments candles are much better than Yankee candles. Once you experience one of our yummy, Candlelit Moments candles, you will never want to try another candle again . Enjoy!


Cost per candle $12.95


****If you would like to substitute another scent other than the cinnamon buns- please put the scent of choice in the comments section. Thank you!****


Order will be processed once payment is received. Orders usually ship within a few days of payment .


Scents available:

Cinnamon Buns (THE TOP SELLER!!!!!!)
Night Blooming Jasmine (Top Seller)
Montego Bay (a.k.a. Coconut, Top Seller)
Ginger Peach (Top Seller)
Flower Shop (Top Seller)
Hawaiian Tropic
Nutty Caramel
Tropical Breeze (a.k.a. Mango/Papaya)
Banana Nut Bread
Pineapple Cilantro
Sage and Citrus
Sienna (Pomegranate and Patchouli)
Cinnamon Vanilla
Plumeria

Please email me your requests to check scent availability. 

Be sure to check out our WONDERFUL cosmetic line at: www.glowcosmeticsinc.com   

We also have a jewelry line with BEAUTIFUL toe rings. Check them out at: www.dazzlemedesigns.net
